name: Space Jam (itch) (Felix Maudru)
description:
!!! THE GAME IS UNFINISHED !!!

Game for the LudumDare44

"SPACE JAM" is a game in which you and your companions must return to your planet in order to bring a cure to the captain's daughter of this ship.
But be careful you have little fuel and the space is sown with shit, you will probably have to concesion to get home.

May the winds please you !
